title: The Dawn Caster
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), high detail 3D Anime cinematic render, 16:9 aspect ratio. A solitary, stylized fisherman standing on dark coastal rocks at dawn. The character wears a traditional conical straw hat (kasa), a loose blue tunic, and exaggerated brown pants. The background features a large, intense sunrise with the sun low on the horizon, painting the sky with soft pink, lavender, and gold clouds. Layered mountain silhouettes stretch across the distance.
